Name: MannaWars
About the game: MannaWars is a fast top-down arcade space shooter, set in a universe ruled by angry gods. Partake in the grand tournament the gods have created, after ripping all inhabited planets in half. Fight for mankind's survival in various game modes, such as deathmatch, team deathmatch, last man standing and diplomatic rescue! Find the best combination of ship, weapon, shield and items! Blast your enemies with lasers, rockets, railguns, and much more! Drop proximity mines, use the teleporter to surprise your opponents, or just use the thumper to get them out of your way!
